text: Abohar Assembly Constituency (Sl. No.: 81) is a Punjab Legislative Assembly constituency in Fazilka district, Punjab state, India. Abohar assembly constituency is one of the 117 seats of Punjab Vidhan Sabha. This constituency is located in Fazilka district of Punjab and comes under the Firozpur (Lok Sabha constituency) seat. 28% Hindu arora, 10% Jatt Sikh, 25% Dalit, 14% Ghumiar bagri, 10% Comboz and 13% others lived there in this constituency. ==List of candidates for Abohar Constituency 2017== {|cellospacing="1" cellpaddingh="1" border="1" width="20%" !Political Party||Candidate Name |- |BSP||Prithi Raj |- |AAP||Atul Nagpal |- |BJP||Arun Narang |- |INC||Sunil Kumar Jakhar |- |IND||Ashok Kumar |- |IND||Amit Doda |- |IND||Shiv Lal Doda |- |IND||Gurjant Singh |- |IND||Dilbag Singh |- |IND||Nathu Ram |- |RSP(A)||Ram Kumar |} ==Result== {|cellospacing="1" cellpaddingh="1" border="1" width="70%" !Year||A C No.||Name||Gender||Party||Votes||Runner Up||Gender||Party||Votes |- |2017||81||Arun Narang||M||BJP||55091||Sunil Jakhar||M||INC||51812 |- |2012||81||Sunil Kumar Jakhar||M||INC||55613||Shiv Lal Doda||M||IND||45825 |- |2007||90||Sunil Kumar Jakhar||M||INC||70679||Ram Kumar||M||BJP||53478 |- |2002||91||Sunil Kumar||M||INC||37552||Sudhir Nagpal||M||IND||30213 |- |1997||91||Ram Kumar||M||BJP||55329||Sajjan Kumar||M||INC||39767 |- |1992||91||Sajjan Kumar||M||INC||38211||Arjan Singh||M||BJP||14107 |- |1985||91||Arjan Singh||M||BJP||33402||Sajjan Kumar||M||INC||29289 |- |1980||91||Sajjan Kumar||M||INC(I)||31929||Charan Dass||M||BJP||22896 |- |1977||91||Bal Ram||M||INC||28823||Satya Dev||M||JNP||20364 |- |1972||5||Bal Ram||M||INC||28517||Satya Dev||M||BJS||13628 |- |1969||5||Satya Dev||M||BJS||20936||Parma Nand||M||IND||16932 |- |1967||5||Satya Dev||M||BJS||21724||Chandi Ram||M||INC||15029 |- |1962||80||Chandi Ram||M||INC||18826||Gian Chand||M||JS||14314 |- |1957||56||Sahi Ram Bishnoi||M||BJS||15336||Chand Ram||M||INC||12690 |- |1951||79||Chandi Ram||M||INC||11686||Kundan Lal||M||BJS||7891 |} ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Punjab, India Category:Fazilka district
